about_the_game:
Dive into the Olympicats DLC for Meow Moments: Celebrating Together! Enjoy a global sports event where cats and characters from around the world join in friendly competitions. Celebrate fair play, peace, and unity through sports, with beautiful illustrations by artist Katia Numakura.

Experience the thrill of international sports as athletes showcase their skills and embody sportsmanship and respect. Join in various sports activities, from gymnastics to team games, and feel the excitement of the Games. The Olympicats DLC celebrates the values that unite us and the joy of friendly competition. Join us in celebrating unity, peace, and cats!

By purchasing this DLC, you can:
  • Play a brand-new scene in the main game.
  • Add the Olympicats content to your creations in the Community and Creative Maker. You can mix items from all the scenes you own in the same scene!
  • Play the scenes created by other players in the Community that include Olympicats items.

You will also support us to create more content and more games!
Thanks in advance!
detailed_description:
Dive into the Olympicats DLC for Meow Moments: Celebrating Together! Enjoy a global sports event where cats and characters from around the world join in friendly competitions. Celebrate fair play, peace, and unity through sports, with beautiful illustrations by artist Katia Numakura.

Experience the thrill of international sports as athletes showcase their skills and embody sportsmanship and respect. Join in various sports activities, from gymnastics to team games, and feel the excitement of the Games. The Olympicats DLC celebrates the values that unite us and the joy of friendly competition. Join us in celebrating unity, peace, and cats!

By purchasing this DLC, you can:
  • Play a brand-new scene in the main game.
  • Add the Olympicats content to your creations in the Community and Creative Maker. You can mix items from all the scenes you own in the same scene!
  • Play the scenes created by other players in the Community that include Olympicats items.

You will also support us to create more content and more games!
Thanks in advance!
name: Meow Moments: Olympicats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join the Olympicats in Meow Moments: Celebrating Together! Celebrate sportsmanship and unity with cats and characters from around the world. Enjoy diverse sports, peaceful competition, and the joy of friendly games.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
